description:
YarConnector.constructor(address,address,address).initialFeeOracle (contracts/YarConnector.sol#18) lacks a zero-check on :
		- feeOracle = initialFeeOracle (contracts/YarConnector.sol#20)

YarHub.constructor(address).initialRelayer (contracts/YarHub.sol#36) lacks a zero-check on :
		- relayer = initialRelayer (contracts/YarHub.sol#37)

YarConnector.constructor(address,address,address).initailFeeToken (contracts/YarConnector.sol#18) lacks a zero-check on :
		- feeToken = initailFeeToken (contracts/YarConnector.sol#21)

YarConnector.constructor(address,address,address).intialRelayer (contracts/YarConnector.sol#18) lacks a zero-check on :
		- relayer = intialRelayer (contracts/YarConnector.sol#19)

Reentrancy in YarConnector.sendMessage(uint256,address,bytes,uint256,uint256,bytes) (contracts/YarConnector.sol#24-60):
	External calls:
	- IERC20(feeToken).safeTransferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),feeAmount) (contracts/YarConnector.sol#56)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- SendMessage(msg.sender,chainId,target,data) (contracts/YarConnector.sol#59)
markdown:
Reentrancy in [YarConnector.sendMessage(uint256,address,bytes,uint256,uint256,bytes)](contracts/YarConnector.sol#L24-L60):
	External calls:
	- [IERC20(feeToken).safeTransferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),feeAmount)](contracts/YarConnector.sol#L56)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- [SendMessage(msg.sender,chainId,target,data)](contracts/YarConnector.sol#L59)

description:
YarConnector.sendMessage(uint256,address,bytes,uint256,uint256,bytes) (contracts/YarConnector.sol#24-60) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(block.timestamp > feeSignatureExpired,feeSignatureExpired!) (contracts/YarConnector.sol#32)
markdown:
[YarConnector.sendMessage(uint256,address,bytes,uint256,uint256,bytes)](contracts/YarConnector.sol#L24-L60) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- [require(bool,string)(block.timestamp > feeSignatureExpired,feeSignatureExpired!)](contracts/YarConnector.sol#L32)

description: Pragma version0.8.20 (contracts/YarConnector.sol#2) necessitates a version too recent to be trusted. Consider deploying with 0.8.18.
markdown: Pragma version[0.8.20](contracts/YarConnector.sol#L2) necessitates a version too recent to be trusted. Consider deploying with 0.8.18.
